name: RealFishing3D
description:
Swing your device like actual fishing, and spin the reel to drain the fish's stamina to make it your catch!
Real Fishing 3D finally hits Google Play!
Experience the ultimate virtual fishing with Real Fishing 3D, with HD graphics and realistic world!
⊙ Features ⊙
1) Various species of fish, from tiny anemone fish to gigantic whales.
2) Each fishing spot provides tons of new quests!
3) Realistically rendered 3D fish!
4) Choose from various beautiful fishing spots.
5) Adjustable control UI!
6) Swing your device like actual fishing, and spin the reel to drain the fish's stamina to make it your catch!
